title: Fireman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to douse someone’s house.
- At night, choose to instead Ignite all doused players, prompting them to either pay you to put out the fire (giving you +1 Profit) or taking a powerful attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You douse all players who roleblock or control you.
Item: Jerry Can
- Cost 1
- Uses 15
- Douse: Douse a player in gas. Select yourself to instead ignite all Doused players, dealing a basic attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all good players (to appease shareholders)

desc:
Post 5061
*We’re having a fire-sale. 80% off. But everything must go NOW!!!*
